description:
The Exorcist Society reveals its true intentions--and the truth about Lindo; Lindo divulges another secret that upends his relationship with Ritsuka.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Himegoto to Urahara no War Cry
Le Haka du secret et de l`hypocrisie
War Cry of Secrets and Contrariness
秘め事と裏腹のウォークライ
